summary.overview: This JCL job performs catalog management operations for the CARDDEMO application by cleaning up existing catalog files and generating a comprehensive inventory report of all datasets under the AWS.M2.CARDDEMO hierarchy for system administration and capacity planning purposes.
business_functions: Dataset Cleanup - Removes existing catalog listing file to ensure clean execution environment
Catalog Inventory Generation - Creates comprehensive report of all CARDDEMO application datasets including attributes and space allocation
System Documentation - Provides complete visibility into dataset inventory for business users and administrators

LISTCAT.jcl.program_overview: IBM utility program for dataset cleanup operations
IBM Access Method Services utility for catalog listing and management

datasource_summary.name: Card Demo Catalog Listing Output File (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.LISTCAT)
datasource_summary.business_name: Card Demo Catalog Listing Output File
datasource_summary.function: Output file used to capture and store catalog listing results with fixed-block format records of 133 characters length for permanent retention
